title: Issue C Orphaned Tab Display Fix
details:
Implemented Issue C from quick-tabs-systemic-issues.md: Enable Orphaned Tab Display and Adoption UI.

Key findings:
1. The rendering pipeline already supported orphaned tabs - groupQuickTabsByOriginTab() creates 'orphaned' group, renderTabGroup() renders with badges, _createTabActions() adds adopt button
2. filterInvalidTabs() in validation.js only filters invalid URLs, NOT orphaned tabs (those with null originTabId)
3. The fix focused on adding comprehensive hydration logging to debug future issues

Changes made:
- validation.js: Added HYDRATION_STARTED, HYDRATION_VALIDATION, HYDRATION_KEPT_FOR_RECOVERY, HYDRATION_BLOCKED_TABS, HYDRATION_COMPLETE logs
- quick-tabs-manager.js: Added ORPHANED_GROUP_RENDER logging when rendering orphaned groups
- quick-tabs-manager.js: Added ADOPTION_INITIATED log when adopt button clicked

The orphaned tab detection and adoption flow was already working correctly - the issue may have been a misunderstanding of what was being blocked. Tabs with null originTabId are kept in state and rendered in the 'orphaned' group with adoption UI.
